base.name: Adder
base.description: Returns a sum by adding/subtracting the inputs per the user definition.
base.development_notes: the parameter operators must be used to configure the number of block inputs. this algorithm can be found in maths.py/Adder/compute_configuration

parameter_definitions.name: operators
parameter_definitions.description: A string containing the signs to apply to each input port, like '++' or '+-'. Must contain exactly as many symbols as input ports. For each operator, an input port named `in_<n>` will be automatically generated (where n is a number starting with 0).
